events.title: Battle of Watcher's Edge
events.description: Two factions clashed under stormlight. The ground still reeks of lightning ash.

events.title: Relic Awakened: Veilroot Totem
events.description: At moonrise, the totem pulsed and whispered. All who slept nearby dreamed of roots.

events.title: Ashfall Arrival
events.description: Black snow fell for an hour. Locals now call it 'The Day of Quiet Flame.'
